body.p: The PDU is designed for top or bottom cable input and output in the front half of the cabinet. Top and bottom cable landing panels are removable. The cable landing panels are galvanized solid plate (not pre-punched) and are not painted. If aluminum conductors are used, there may be limitations on conduit. Differences in conduit capacity for copper and aluminum conductors are shown in .

When applicable, provisions must be made for cable entry through the raised floor once the PDU has been properly located. Cable entry openings should be free of any sharp edges and designed to allow permanent access for input power cables and distribution cables.
